analysis.key_quote: This "reform" will push us back to a time when the incoming president can simply wipe out the bureaucracy in place and fill in the management system with people he or she or they like.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by referencing historical reforms aimed at preventing politicization of the civil service and emphasizes the importance of integrity and know-how in government, which aligns with concerns about merit-based systems.
